{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC Midwest & Wheatbelt| |callsign = 6GN | |coordinates = {{Coord|28|46|33.94|S|114|36|21.24|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 3 February 1945| |frequency = 828 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Midwest
1215 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Midwest
531 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Wheatbelt| |area = [[Mid West (Western Australia)|Midwest]] [[Wheatbelt (Western Australia)|Wheatbelt]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/wheatbelt/ http://www.abc.net.au/wheatbelt/] | }} '''ABC Midwest & Wheatbelt''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Geraldton, Western Australia|Geraldton]]. The station broadcasts to the [[Mid West (Western Australia)|Mid West]] and [[Wheatbelt (Western Australia)|Wheatbelt]] regions of [[Western Australia]]. This includes the towns of [[Meekatharra, Western Australia|Meekatharra]] [[Northam, Western Australia|Northam]] and [[Dalwallinu, Western Australia|Dalwallinu]]. The station broadcasts through three main [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] transmitters. '''6GN''' on 828 AM, '''6NM''' on 1215 AM and '''6DL''' on 531 AM. There are also a number of low power FM transmitters. When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[720 ABC Perth]]. ==External links== *[http://www.abc.net.au/wheatbelt/ ABC Midwest & Wheatbelt] ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in Western Australia]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc Midwest And Wheatbelt}}
